#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
 
    cin>>t;
 
    while(t--)
    {
       string s;
       string n;
        cin>>n;
        cin>>s;
        int a[26];
        memset(a,0,sizeof a);
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
        a[s[i]-'a']++;
        int x=0;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)x=x^a[i];
        if(x==0)
        {
            if(n=="Tarun")
                cout<<"Varun\n";
            else
                cout<<"Tarun\n";
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<n<<endl;
        }
    }
}
